body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Learn what's new at Keweenaw NHP               Explore history with multimedia               Explore the fascinating history of the Keweenaw               Learning history can be fun for kids too! Explore the other pages in this section to learn more.   News Browse press releases.     Photos & More Experience the park from afar through photos, videos and more.     History & Culture Discover the history of people and places of the Keweenaw.   Education Want to plan a field trip to the park? Find out more here about how to bring your class, explore a copper timeline or find lesson plans.    Kids & Youth Learn how to become a Jr Ranger or a Web Ranger. Discover fun ways to explore the Keweenaw with your family and what a Smackdown is!   Management Learn more about how the park and the Keweenaw NHP Advisory Commission work together to further the efforts of historic preservation.   Bookstore Explore Isle Royale & Keweenaw Parks Association bookstore and learn how to become a member.    Nature Discover the role nature has played in this changing landscape.
title: Keweenaw National Historical Park: Learn About the Park
